Request an Appointment

Service

Case Management Services in Wilson, NC

Case Management is a service for adults, women who are pregnant and children age three (3) and older who have a serious emotional disturbance, mental illness, or a substance abuse related disorder. Case Management assists recipients in gaining access to necessary care and medical, behavioral, social, housing and other services appropriate to their needs.

Call Now Request an Appointment

Confidential care. No referral required.

What this service is

Case Management is a service for adults, women who are pregnant and children age three (3) and older who have a serious emotional disturbance, mental illness, or a substance abuse related disorder. Case Management assists recipients in gaining access to necessary care and medical, behavioral, social, housing and other services appropriate to their needs.

Case Management is a service for adults, women who are pregnant and children age three (3) and older who have a serious emotional disturbance, mental illness, or a substance abuse related disorder.

Case Management assists recipients in gaining access to necessary care and medical, behavioral, social, housing and other services appropriate to their needs. It is individualized, person-centered, empowering, comprehensive, strengths-based, and outcome-focused.

The functions of Case Management include: Case Management Assessment; Person Centered Planning; Referral/Linkage; and Monitoring/Follow-up.

Instilling Hope


We are with you through your treatment and beyond.

Call us today at (919) 269-9300


 

Who it’s for

People seeking support for recovery, mental wellness, or life challenges who want structured, compassionate care.

Benefits

  • Clear next steps and supportive guidance
  • Confidential, respectful care
  • Coordinated support tailored to you

What to expect

  • Personalized intake to understand your goals and needs
  • Clear care plan with measurable milestones
  • Coordinated support from our clinical team
  • Regular progress check-ins and adjustments

What happens when you call

  1. We listen and answer immediate questions.
  2. We explain your options and next steps.
  3. If you choose, we schedule an appointment.

No referral required.

FAQ

How do I start Case Management?

Call us or request an appointment and our team will guide you through next steps.

Do you accept insurance?

We can verify benefits and review coverage options before you begin.

What does scheduling look like?

We offer flexible scheduling based on clinical needs and availability.

Ready to take the next step?

Call today or request an appointment. We’ll listen, answer your questions, and help you move forward.
